name: sparky
title: Sparky
description: Live data binding templating library for the DOM.

scripts.build-nodeps: cat js/frame.js js/struct.js js/mount.js js/sparky.js js/sparky.fn.import.js js/sparky.fn.request.js js/sparky.fn.template.js js/sparky.fn.each.js js/sparky.transforms.js > dist/sparky-nodeps.js && minify dist/sparky-nodeps.js
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/sparky.js dist/sparky-2.3.2.js && cp dist/sparky.min.js dist/sparky-2.3.2.min.js && cp dist/sparky.css dist/sparky-2.3.2.css
